data.name: Marketing in a Crisis
data.summary: Topic: Marketing in a Crisis What changes in a crisis and what should you continue doing Turning a crisis into an opportunity and executing strategically Preparing for life after the crisis and not being under leveraged Case study: how Vymo executed one of its most successful campaigns in the middle of the crisis. Audience: the interactive session will be most relevant for, B2B/SaaS Entrepreneurs B2B Marketers/Enthusiasts
